Back in the day Swing was so cool because you could make your app look like a napkin. Of course most of us don't think much about desktop apps or applets anymore, so the Napkin craze faded away. But I'm here to say that The Napkin Skin is back and better than ever! And now it's based on web technology that people actually have and use. For more info about how Eylon Stroh created this work of art, check out his blogs: Napkin skins, stage one: CSS styles and graphical skins Napkin skins, stage two: programmatic skins
